entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 33 by morning. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 31. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
